actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution providing for the immediate consideration of the bill H.R. 466 to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of the United States and of the district courts to enter any judgment, decree, or order, denying or restricting, as unconstitutional, voluntary prayer in any public school.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 466 (Prayer in public schools).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the immediate consideration of the bill H.R. 466 to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of the United States and of the district courts to enter any judgment, decree, or order, denying or restricting, as unconstitutional, voluntary prayer in any public school.
